text: Douglas County, Georgia is a county in the U.S. state of Georgia. The county's capital is Douglasvile. As of 2020, Douglas County had a population of 144,237 people. ==Cities and towns== *Austell (also in Cobb County) *Douglasville *Villa Rica (also in Carroll County) *Lithia Springs ==Rural communities== * Anneewakee * Beulah * Bill Arp * Chapel Hill * Fairplay * Fouts Mill * Hannah * McWhorter * Phillips Mill * Tributary * White City * Winston ==References== Category:1870 establishments in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Georgia (U.S. state) counties
title: Douglas County, Georgia
